articles.title: Foxconn founder urges Apple to move from China
articles.description: The billionaire founder of Apple's largest supplier has asked the US company to move part of its sprawling production chain from China to neighbouring Taiwan.

articles.title: US slams China's 'extreme hostility' towards religious freedom in report
articles.description: US government condemns China's 'intense persecution' of religious faiths, days before Donald Trump's meeting with Xi Jinping at the G20 summit.
